name: To Another World Conquest v0.5
description:
Download the game: https://www.sendspace.com/file/b49osm Windows

Its the God's fault Yasa died by mistake, to that reason the God summoned him into another world and magic do exist there!

Become an adventurer and explore the world! Make your own harem! Heroine characters with different unique personalities make them your own by completing their stories.

-Pet System
Buy Pets to help you with your journey.

Grind monsters and have a Boss battle to earn gold etc.

Many things to come for the future updates!

If you enjoy the game and wish to support us.

https://www.patreon.com/xaviertatata

-GM

This is the first release of To Another World Conquest We will do our very best to make the game more better, more characters, pets and armours etc to come for every updates! Don't miss it!
